value.name: Grand jury rules shooting involving Savannah Police at motel was justified
value.description: Five Savannah police officers shot and killed Joshua Boyd after he pointed a gun at them back in December. Officers responded to a 911 call made from America’s Best Value Inn on Ogeechee Road. There, they found Sandee Warren dead in the parking lot.
